title: Minecraft Animations of 2013 - Slamacow
author: 星E君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2014-1-1 10:30 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjU2MTQ2NTY4/v.swf




原介绍（给一些英语差的翻译了一下）：
All the animations I've worked on in 2013. Happy New Year! - Steven这些是我在2013年做的所有的短片。新年快乐！- 史蒂文

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slamacow
Facebook: http://on.fb.me/Iix1QB 
Live Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/slamacowcreations

看我其他的动画：http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2026E1A1A4DE6AA4 
Watch all my animations here: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2026E1A1A4DE6AA4

看全部的Dig Build Live：http://www.youtube.com/playlist? ... v14xa49P30JBarIyR0R 
Watch all Dig Build Live episodes here: http://www.youtube.com/playlist? ... v14xa49P30JBarIyR0R

Take Back the Night音乐地址:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kwwl9jiJ1A4 
Take Back the Night music video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kwwl9jiJ1A4

New World音乐地址：http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3V7wWemZ_cs 
New World music video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3V7wWemZ_cs

Kubbi制作的音乐
Custom music by Kubbi
More of his work: http://kubbi.bandcamp.com/
